title: Shark attack font
content:
Can be seen here: [http://4.bp.blogspot.com/\_mOBsoNLtgrg/SiExOfInelI/AAAAAAAAADo/wLrpt8h-vO...](http://web.archive.org/web/20101022164015/http:/4.bp.blogspot.com/_mOBsoNLtgrg/SiExOfInelI/AAAAAAAAADo/wLrpt8h-vOY/s1600-h/SharkAttack.jpg "http://4.bp.blogspot.com/\_mOBsoNLtgrg/SiExOfInelI/AAAAAAAAADo/wLrpt8h-vOY/s1600-h/SharkAttack.jpg")

Customized or a font?  
Anyone a clue?  
thx guys!
author: mr_ampersand

comments.content:
_"where can i get it?"_

The point of Jan's answer is that you would have to draw it yourself, since it isn't a font.

Or maybe pick something from [these choices](http://web.archive.org/web/20101022164015/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/Horror/fonts/).

- Mike Yanega
